name: George-Claudiu Carcadia
bio: I've been using Python since two and a half years ago and I really fell in love with it. I really hope that I can share my knowledge with others and also become more knowledgeable myself along the way.

name: Bahram Aghaei
bio: I'm enthusiastic learner who is always looking for new projects and challenges and a huge Free Software enthusiast. Reach out if you want to talk about technology, life and sports.

name: Gokul Chittaranjan
bio: Have over a decade of experience working with Python.
